pages.text: $(li)Netherite ingots are hard processed ingots that can be crafted with Gold Ingots and Netherite Scrap in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)They can be found rarely in Loot Chests of the Nether too.
$(li)Netherite Ingots can be used to craft Netherite Nuggets and viceversa.$(br)$(li)They can be used to craft multiple items in a Crafting Table or Smithing Table.
